author: Howard Schneider
title: Florida, Nevada may be hit hardest by coronavirus economic shock: study
description: Florida beaches remained packed with partying college students as the coronavirus crisis gathered force, and the Republican governor was slow to impose social distancing in a tourist-dependent economy.
content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Florida beaches remained packed with partying college students as the coronavirus crisis gathered force, and the Republican governor was slow to impose social distancing in a tourist-dependent economy. 
That may come back to haunt the … [+4603 chars]
